issue.title: Build fails with missing module error
issue.body:
### Issue Type
build

### Operating System
Ubuntu 22.04

### Version
2.5.1

### Build Tool Version
npm 9.6.7

### Error Message
Error: Cannot find module 'webpack'

### Build Command
npm run build

### Build Log
```
npm run build
> build
> webpack --mode production

node:internal/modules/cjs/loader:1078
  throw err;
  ^

Error: Cannot find module 'webpack'
Require stack:
- /home/user/project/node_modules/.bin/webpack
    at Module._resolveFilename (node:internal/modules/cjs/loader:1075:15)
```

### Steps to Reproduce
1. Clone the repository
2. Run npm install
3. Run npm run build
